title: What I should take for +1? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends upon you that what should you choose, Science is only Recommended if you have interest in this field..Think of the career path you love to choose and choose the stream wisely in order to no to regret about it.. Have a good Day :)

Its totally depends upon your interest. If you like science and you want to explore the world from point of view of science you should take it. But you don't like science you should find your future in other fields of your interest. As I am a computer science engineering student I can tell you about scope in computer science engineering. Because world is going towards to computer there is many carrier's chance.
